body.para: Not sure what you mean by message board as that is not a part of a Google Group nor by a site you created for your group, since groups are sites. Every Google Group has a discuissions section with on line messages, which you may call a board, and every Google Group is a web site, though limited in some ways.

You cannot take apart a Google Gropup and put some of the pieces in another web sit if that is what you mean. The are one integrated unit, membership list, Home page, discussions, pages and files sections, managment task area, settings area. None of it can be disassembled. You can change the order some units and you can "Hide" certain sections which does not really hide them from any intelligent user.

quote.quotepara: I would like to take the message board from my group and insert it in an editable form within the Google site i have created for my group. If anyone knows of a way of accomplishing this task, please let me know. If not, then hopefully I'm not the only one with this
